TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public MustInherit Class AutomationPeer Inherits DispatcherObject
.class public auto ansi abstract AutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供一个可将元素公开给 UI 自动化的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class that exposes an element to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 查询某个元素的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序的根时，根将为该元素返回 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 对等方。When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element. 对等方还会响应有关其对应元素的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 查询。The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在由派生类的构造函数调用时，它们可对基类值进行初始化。

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，由 调用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序响应键盘事件以提供快捷键行为，则它应返回包含键盘快捷键组合的字符串。If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination. 例如，对于可以将文本复制到剪贴板的元素，此附加属性可能设置为值 "CTRL + C"。For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetAccessKey() cil managed

summary.span: 获取与自动化对等关联的元素的访问密钥。

span.span: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.

returns.span: 包含访问密钥的字符串。

span.span: The string that contains the access key.

exception.span: 目前正在对此方法进行公开调用。

span.span: A public call to this method is currently in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAccessKeyCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetAccessKeyCore () As String

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，由 调用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .

returns.span: 包含访问密钥的字符串。

span.span: The string that contains the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问键（有时称为键盘快捷方式或助记键）是菜单、菜单项或控件的标签（如调用关联菜单功能的按钮）的文本中的字符。An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function. 例如，若要提供打开 `File` 菜单（访问键通常为 F）的快捷方式，元素可能将此附加属性设置为 "ALT + F"。For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".

summary.span: 告知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 树中何处放置由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 元素托管的 。

span.span: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

returns.span: 此方法会将托管的 返回到托管 对象的控件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

span.span: This method returns the hosted to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将托管的 `hwnd` 返回到托管 `hwnd` 对象的控件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects. 与直接承载 `hwnd` 的元素关联的 必须重写此方法。The that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method. 如果未重写此方法，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 会将 `hwnd` 作为承载整个应用程序的 的子元素。If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the that hosts the whole application. 通常，你希望重写此默认行为，并将 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 设置为将承载的 `hwnd` 并行定位到它在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 逻辑树中的位置。Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] logical tree. 除宿主方案外，不允许 类型重写此方法。Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow types to override this method. 除了重写此方法以外，与立即承载 `hwnd` 的元素关联的 类型必须返回强制转换为 的 ，以响应承载 WM_GETOBJECT 的 `hwnd`。In addition to overriding this method, the types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the that is cast to in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`. 若要获取指向 的指针，请调用 。To get a pointer to , call .

summary.span: 获取以元素为目标的 的 。

span.span: Gets the for the that is targeted to the element.
The for the element that is targeted by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果元素是 控件，则 方法将获取与 关联的 的 。For example, if the element is a control, the method gets the for the that is associated with the . 在下图中， "Themes" 以 为目标;因此， 的 也以 为目标。In the following image, the "Themes" is targeted to the ; therefore the for the also targets the . 当用户按下**ALT**+**t**时， 将获得焦点而不是 。When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the gets focus instead of the . ![显示属性显示使用情况标记](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "显示属性显示按用法标记")![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") 的 方法返回相应 的 。The method for returns the for the corresponding . 这使自动化客户端可以获取描述 的文本字符串。This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the .

exception.span: 目前正在对此方法进行公开调用。

Protected MustOverride Function GetNameCore () As String

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，由 调用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .
The string that contains the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此值视为一个字符串，用户可以使用该字符串来解释它们引用的控件。You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to. 工具（如讲述人）使用此属性告诉用户控件的内容。This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is. 例如，带有字符串 "确定" 的按钮应返回 "OK"。For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK". 允许用户选择颜色的 控件可能会返回 "颜色"。A control that lets users select a color might return "Colors". 请确保已为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] 中的所有控件指定了一个名称，以便辅助功能工具（如屏幕阅读器）能够以本地化方式引用每个控件。Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidatePeer() cil managed

summary.span: 触发对 主要属性的重新计算，如果属性已更改，则引发对自动化客户端的 通知。

span.span: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the and raises the notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主属性的示例包括但不限于 和 。Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, and . 通常，更新和通知在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的布局更新后自动发生。Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]. （发生更新以响应 的事件。）但有时，属性会发生更改，而不会引发 事件。(The update occurs in response to the event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the event. 例如，当整个 移动时，不会引发 事件。For example, when the whole moves, the event is not raised. 在此示例中，因为对象以屏幕坐标表示，所以 对象集发生变化。In this example, the set of objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates. 因此， 必须对 上的对等方调用 。Therefore, the must call on its peer on .

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsContentElement() cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与此自动化对等方关联的元素是否包含向用户显示的数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.

returns.span: 如果元素为内容元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is a content element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Content 元素包含向用户显示的数据。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 内容元素的一个示例是列表框中的项或对话框中的按钮。An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box. 通常使用非内容元素（也称为外围元素）来处理复合控件中的内容。You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control. 非 content 元素的一个示例是下拉控件中的按钮。An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示元素是否可见。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素位于屏幕上，但仍不可见。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 例如，如果元素位于屏幕上，但被其他元素遮盖，则它可能不可见。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在这种情况下，该方法将返回 `false`。In this case, the method returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool ListenerExists(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationEvents eventId) cil managed
Public Shared Function ListenerExists (eventId As AutomationEvents) As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在侦听指定的事件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.

returns.span: 指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在侦听事件的 。

span.span: A that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，在创建引发事件的 之前调用此方法。Typically, you call this method before creating the that raises the event. 此方法是一种性能度量，因为如果 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 不侦听事件，则创建一个对等方将无法进行此类事件。This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one. > [!NOTE] > 此方法是静态的，仅当某个委托侦听 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]中指定的事件，而不是在特定元素上的事件中侦听时的答案。This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 可以创建广播侦听器;因此，每个元素的信息是不相关的。can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
